classification_criteria.GOOD: Readable with 0-2% errors or <1 clear error per page
classification_criteria.MARGINAL: 1-2 errors or errors in 2-5% of content
classification_criteria.BAD: >2 clear errors per page or >5% error rate causing readability issues

notes: French, German, Greek, Latin words are NOT counted as errors
Footnote markers like 'word23' are NOT counted as errors
Proper nouns and author names are NOT counted as errors
Classification based on error_rate from OCR metadata + text analysis
